Question
========
In which of the following research designs is there a possible mediation effect?

Answerlist
----------
* A study that studies whether the effect of parental educational attainment on the child's income disappears when educational attainment is taken into account
* A study examining whether the effect of parental educational attainment on the child's income disappears when grandparents' socioeconomic status is taken into account
* A study examining whether the effect of parental education level on the child's income differs between boys and girls
* A study examining whether both parental education level and grandparents' socioeconomic status have an effect on the child's income

Solution
========
Here you have a design TRUE to test 2 separate effects on the dependent Y (child's income): the effect of the independent X<sub>1</sub> (parents' education level) and the independent X<sub>2</sub> (grandparents' socioeconomic status).


Answerlist
----------
* True
* False
* False
* False
